about_the_game:
Welcome to the Fantasy Adult World!

Immerse yourself in an open world for PC that promises to captivate your imagination.

Living Doll

In "Living Dolls", step into the shoes of a magical artificial being. Bond with the inhabitants, build your strength, and create fully customizable dolls to aid you in battles!

Principal Features

  • Open World Exploration
  • Engaging Adult Scenes
  • Fully Customizable Characters
  • Unique Futanari Feature
  • Kinky NPCs
  • Stunning World Aesthetics
  • AAA-Game Class Visuals
  • Intense Sword Fights
  • Crafting & Experience System

Planned Features

  • Introduction of New Species & Furry Characters
  • Engrossing Story Mode
  • Party System with Other Dolls
  • Mysterious Dungeons
  • Engaging Quest System
  • Buyable & Upgradable Houses
  • Full Voice Dubbing
  • Expansion to New Lands and Locations

content_descriptors.notes: Living doll sex scenes are part of the gameplay. Characters are always of age and consent without any gore. Sensitive people might misinterpret the presence of CNC (Consensual Non-Consent) action, so it's important to understand that this is part of the game and that livingdollrebirth does not advocate sexual violence.

name: Living Dolls Rebirth Alpha

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 5500k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 7700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Welcome in this fantasy Adult world. Enjoy and explore this world and its inhabitants freely! This open world for PC will blow your mind!
